body.name: Wrangler Men's 13mwz Cowboy Cut Original Fit Jean
features: ORIGINAL FIT. Designed with a functional fit in mind, these jeans are made to stack over your favorite pair of boots. Constructed with a comfortable fit in the waist, seat, and thigh, this jean is made for both function and comfort for long days in the saddle

CLASSIC COWBOY JEAN. Made for authentic cowboys and worn by world champions, this original cowboy cut jean is a tried and true classic. As the Official ProRodeo Competition jean, this western denim essential will stay with you for years to come and maintain that timeless cowboy style

DURABLE MATERIALS. It's no question that this classic can withstand wear and tear. Made with durable heavyweight cotton and felled seams to prevent chafing, this original fit jean was made to last -- no matter the task

COMFORTABLE WEAR. Whether you're out on the ranch or working in the garage, you need a durable jean that keeps you comfortable throughout the day. Made from 100% cotton, this jean provides comfort and breathability for your day ahead

FIVE POCKET STYLING. This cowboy cut jean is constructed with an authentic five pocket styling: (1) watch pocket, (2) front scoop pockets, (3) back patch pockets. Finished with copper rivets for added long-lasting durability

These comfortable, durable jeans come fully equipped with all the authentic details you'd expect from a hallmark of cowboy culture, including a classic neolite patch, five-pocket styling, and our signature 'W' stitching.
body.description: WranglerOriginal fitCowboy cutRigid indigo originalHeavyweight 14 3/4 broken twill 100 Cotton5 pocket stylingTrophy buckle belt loopsRiveted pocketsZip closure13mwz For more than 70 years, our 13MWZ Cowboy Cut jeans have been a tried-and-true wardrobe staple for cowboys across the country. Today, 13MWZ is the official ProRodeo competition jean. We knew a good thing when we saw it, which is why the Wrangler Cowboy Cut jeans haven't changed much since they were first designed by Rodeo Ben Lichenstein in 1947. These comfortable, durable jeans come fully equipped with all the authentic details you'd expect from a hallmark of cowboy culture, including a classic neolite patch, five-pocket styling, and our signature 'W' stitching. When it comes to keeping your wardrobe in check and ready for anything, you can never have too many pairs of the men's Cowboy Cut Wrangler jeans. 13MWZ

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best jeans EVER
reviews.reviewText: I have about 6-7 pairs of these. The price is right, they fit perfect, look really cool with nice boots and last a long time. I have bought other name brands and they do not come close to the fit of these jeans.Highly recommend for fit, price and durrablity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I buy these for my husband who has been wearing them for over 20 years,He likes the original cowboy bootcut,He doesn’t like pre washed,The color is a nice deep blue,the stitching is good he has never had any issues with that,They are of course very stiff I wash them once and they are softer but not much which is what he likes,He switched from Levi’s which he wore since he was a teenager mainly because of the price and quality,Wrangler’s fit him very well they are not to short in the crotch he is long waisted 6’2 I buy him 35x34’s and they’re a perfect fit they don’t shrink after washing and drying and the color holds up well but will start to fade eventually but that’s it they still hold up well with the stitching, I would and he says he would recommend the wranglers for durability 100%,I hope this helps anyone considering purchasing these,Like I said they are durable and the quality is good…When trying to add the size to the guide it wouldn’t let me but like I said my husband is 6’2 the guide wouldn’t let me go pass 5’4,He’s 225 lbs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Timeless Classic and Ultimate Comfort
reviews.reviewText: The Wrangler Men’s 13MWZ Cowboy Cut Original Fit Jean is an absolute masterpiece of denim craftsmanship. As a long-time fan of Wrangler jeans, I can confidently say that these jeans deserve every bit of their 5-star rating. Here's why I'm such a devoted fan:1. Classic Cowboy Cut: These jeans have that iconic cowboy cut that I've come to love. They provide ample room in the seat and thigh, making them incredibly comfortable and allowing for unrestricted movement.2. Legendary Durability: Wrangler is renowned for producing jeans that can withstand the test of time, and these are no exception. They're built to last and handle the rigors of both work and everyday wear.3. Authentic Style: The Cowboy Cut style exudes authenticity and timeless charm. Whether I'm wearing them for a casual day out or dressing them up a bit, they always look great.4. Comfortable Fit: The original fit is just right, offering comfort without being too loose or too tight. They feel comfortable all day long, whether I'm sitting at a desk or on horseback.5. Versatile Wardrobe Staple: These jeans are incredibly versatile and can be paired with a wide range of tops and shoes, making them a true wardrobe staple.6. Quality Denim: The denim used in these jeans is of exceptional quality. It's sturdy yet soft, and it breaks in beautifully over time, molding to my body for a personalized fit.7. Easy Care: They're easy to care for and maintain. They can handle regular washing without losing their shape or color.In summary, the Wrangler Men’s 13MWZ Cowboy Cut Original Fit Jean is a classic and timeless piece of Americana. It offers the perfect combination of style, comfort, and durability that Wrangler is known for. These jeans have been a part of my wardrobe for years, and they continue to impress me with their quality and performance. If you're in search of the perfect pair of jeans that can take you from work to play and everywhere in between, look no further. These jeans deserve every one of their 5 stars and are a true testament to Wrangler's legacy of excellence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Baggy and Loose
reviews.reviewText: The pants fit well after getting my boots on but if I don’t have my boots on, then they are a little long when most 34x32 pants aren’t. The waste is also somewhat large for me. They are a little baggy but I’m ok with it. However, the pockets are a little rough when trying to get my hands in and out for my phone or keys. Other than that, I like them! They look really nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Jeans that last...
reviews.reviewText: My hubby has been wearing these jeans for years. Although he hasn't changed with the times, these jeans are timeless. They look great on his bottom & fit in all the right places.His old ones he wears on weekends and are 7-8 yrs old. No holes. Only a bit of fading over time. Will keep buying them for him!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great pair of jeans! My husband loves these pants! Comfy and true to fit....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Go 1 size up in the waist & get your normal length
reviews.reviewText: These jeans a fantastic. Only thing is sizing is a little tricky. The rise on these is high so you’ll need to go up a waist size to get them over you hips to button. The “rigid” pair is also unsanforized so they will shrink a little after washing. Going up a size will essentially have them “shrink to fit” you perfectly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, really stiff!!
reviews.reviewText: Bought these and they are fitted and sized correctly, but they are very stiff even with breaking them in. Pockets are not very deep and it’s quite annoying. Quality is great but otherwise it’s ok.

reviews.reviewTitle: Stiff as a board until the first wash (thank goodness)
reviews.reviewText: These seem to hold up very well. I am very tough on jeans and these seem up to the task. These are not some soft, cushy jean. They are meant for real work on a farm or ranch. If you want tough jeans, these are for you. Sizing is pretty accurate. Once you wash them a few times they do get a bit softer but they are still a tough jean.

I’ve wore Wrangler jeans my entire life, the good ones not Walmart cheap end. These jeans I purchased are worse I’ve ever bought. Day one rip full length of back pocket right at pocket seam. Crappy product for expensive price

For me these jeans are true to size and are of the same weight and quality of denim as Levi’s but for less money. They have more room in the seat and thigh than Levi 501’s and are much more comfortable to move in.

My son has only been able to find a 26 x 34 at one store in black. No one seems to have his size in store or on-line. He's been that size since teens and is now in his twenties. They've now discontinued that size. We found these in a 27 x 34 in black and took a gamble. They fit and only slightly big. And he only wears "black". Please don't discontinue this size.
Me encantó el pantalón, muy buena marca y calidad de material
